form.termsAndConditions: I agree with <1>Terms and Conditions</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>

awaitingConfirmation.title: Awaiting confirmation
awaitingConfirmation.subtitle: We have sent you an email to {{emailAddress}} with a confirmation link. Please verify that the security code below matches the one in the email.

emailConfirmed.title: Email Confirmed!
emailConfirmed.subtitle: You can return to your Rocket.Chat application – we have launched your workspace already.

cloudDescription.tryGold: Try our best Gold plan for 14 days for free
cloudDescription.goldIncludes: * Golden plan includes all features from other plans

page.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? <1>Manage your workspaces.</1>

adminInfoForm.title: Admin Info
adminInfoForm.subtitle: We need this to create an admin profile inside your workspace

organizationInfoForm.title: Organization Info
organizationInfoForm.subtitle: Please, bear with us. This info will help us personalize your workspace

accountEmailForm.description: To register your server, we need to connect it to your cloud account. If you already have one - we can link it automatically for you. Otherwise, a new account will be created.

register.title: Register server
register.subtitle: What is included
register.description: Preconfigured gateways and proxies provided by Rocket.Chat Technologies Corp.

standalone.title: Standalone server
standalone.description: You will have to set up the environment by yourself:

actionList.mobile: and recompile mobile apps with your certificates
